tasks.label: Build Debug
args: [[ -f build/debug/CMakeCache.txt ]] || (mkdir -p build/debug && cd build/debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug ../..); cd build/debug && cmake --build . -j
tasks.detail: Configure with CMake (Debug) only if not already configured, then build
